original_query: Query 1: Whats the latest between India and Pakistan?

article_summaries.text: US President Donald Trump announced on Truth Social that India and Pakistan agreed to a full and immediate ceasefire after US-mediated talks. India reported Pakistan's "provocative" actions, including troop movements to the border, attacks on military bases and medical facilities in Srinagar, Avantipura, and Udhampur, and air raids in Srinagar. India retaliated against Pakistan's air raid. Air raid warning sirens sounded in Chandigarh due to possible drone attacks.

Bilawal to lead delegation; India sending seven all-party delegations. Company challenges "national security" rhetoric lacking specific threat details in court. FO requests partners ensure India honours commitments; FM Dar thanks UK for de-escalation role. Woman publicly denounced an ACID Cannes film section executive during sexual assault discussion.

Pakistan launched a drone attack in Samba, sirens in Amritsar. Operation Sindoor, Indias counter-terror strategy, eliminated over 100 terrorists including Yusuf Azhar, Abdul Malik Rauf, and Mudasir Ahmed, destroying nine terror camps in Pakistan. Lieutenant General Rajeev Ghai, Vice Admiral A.N. Pramod, and Air Marshal A.K. Bharti announced the operation, showcasing Indias precision and tri-service coordination. Recent night was peaceful in Jammu and Kashmir.
